name: ScanAI
description: Introducing ScanAI, the all-in-one multi-chain exploration Telegram bot. This innovative tool offers easy access to blockchain insights, interaction with smart contracts and more, straight from the Telegram platform across many major blockchains. ScanAI is equipped with a range of powerful features to simplify and enhance the seemingly complex crypto experience, offering users an efficient and powerful way to look up and interact with the world of crypto.
